articleData.blog_content:
I was always interested in doing something for the community and especially for education, so in July 2019 my friend encouraged me to attend the recruitment drive of Desire Foundation. I was asked about Project Adhyayan which I fortunately knew. After that I was selected as a Digital Marketing Intern and my journey started in Desire Foundation.

Firstly I was assigned the calling tasks where I had to call the parents and tell them about Desire Foundation and how we can try to help them.Those slum visits and the joy of meeting the kids and their parents and realising that we can help them in fullfilling their dream of education was beyond any kind of happiness.Desire Foundation has not only provided me with an internship but has also given me a lot of experience and has helped me develop myself.
